file_content.text: I was told you would have the cure?
Here's the Republic's research. It's all that's left of their labs.
Perfect! Our scientists will get right to work.
You have my gratitude, my lord. Thank to your efforts, we'll finally cleanse the Empire of this filthy spice hunger.
Your assistance has proven invaluable, agent. Be safe. And remember, report your fellow spice-guzzling officers.
Your payment's posted to your account, hunter. Do me a favor: Don't blow it on spice.
I can't thank you enough. We'll cure our boys' spice fever in no time.
Apologies, but I'm afraid I'm waiting for someone.
